update
biz_id = #{bizId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update

mapper.select:
select biz_id AS bizId,gmt_created AS operateDate,operation_type AS operationType, table_name AS tableName,object_id AS domainKey,business_name AS businessName, operation_ip AS operationIp,creator AS operationUser from
where is_deleted =0
AND operation_type = #{operationType}
AND business_name concat('%',#{businessName},'%')
AND creator concat('%',#{operationUser},'%')
order by gmt_modified desc
